home.intro: Find your paper print template for all occations - weddings, birthdays or celebrations. Pick a design and provide a list - we will do the rest. Invitations, place cards, save the date and much more.

contact.intro: Send us an email to hello (at) inktemplate.com.

create.intro: Create your own design for your print! Maybe you find some nice designs from our library? Play with fonts, text and colors to get your own custom design! Click on the preview button when you are ready.
create.paid: (You have already paid for this print)

popup.paid: You already paid for this print!
popup.info: When purchased we sent you a link to the print by email.
popup.new: Do you want to create a new? Or download?

generate.intro: Looking good! You can download your print or upgrade to premium.

products.intro: Here is all the different kind of prints we can make for you! Select design and provide the text you want and we will do the rest of the work to create a print for you.

placecard.description: Create a place card for your event. The card is a two sided folded card. The table card can be placed on the table to indicate where you want to place your guest. Or maybe you want to label food on the table?
placecard.name: Place card

nametag.description: Create nametags for your event. You can print the paper for plastic badges, stickers or necklace. Bring the guest list and we will prepare your print.
nametag.name: Nametag

invitation.description: Do you want to create personal invites for your wedding, party or event? Select between beautiful designs and send us your guest list.
invitation.name: Invitation

savethedate.description: Do you want your guests to save the date? We have a selction of design you can use for your invitations. Send us the text and your guest list and we will make prepare them for you.
savethedate.name: Save the date

popup.sorry: Sorry - we have not implemented this print yet. We have registred your interest and we are working on it!

receipt.intro: We sent you an email to {{email}}! You can always get back here to change your guest list or download a new copy. Happy printing!
